column3: Person/s in charge of site operations
column5: Person/s in charge of site operations
Ducted AC unit installed c/w isolation mounts & filters
Living & Bedroom cushion boxes & flex duct installed
Refrigeration pipes roughed in and installed to common riser
Drain pipes roughed in and Terminated internal tundish
Wall penetration Fire caulking completed and fire penetration labelled / documented.
Pressure testing of Refrigeration pipework complete
Indoor unit fit off and installed correctly
Grilles fit off and installed correctly & B/fly dampers left open
All drains fit off and tested
Condenser unit fit off, pipes and wires sealed and capped where required
Ensure all rubbish and materials have been picked up and room is clean
Wall controller time and date set
Drain terminated at indoor unit correctly (photo)
Take photo of model and serial number
Visible duct installed correctly and free of obstruction
Fan operating and free of vibration
Correct Operating Temperatures and Pressures (provide 1 x temp read)
Apartment is Completed to ASC satisfaction and ready for handover
